::: {.cell hash='05_dag_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_29cb80b3c2205998e8f80cfd8718abec'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dagitty)


dag <- dagitty('dag {
  ParkingSpots -> Location
  ParkingSpots -> Sales
  Location -> Sales
}')


plot(dag)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> Plot coordinates for graph not supplied! Generating coordinates, see ?coordinates for how to set your own.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
customer_sat<- readRDS("customer_sat.rds")

model_1 <- lm(satisfaction ~ follow_ups, data = customer_sat)
summary(model_1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = satisfaction ~ follow_ups, data = customer_sat)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -12.412  -5.257   1.733   4.506  12.588 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)  78.8860     4.2717  18.467 1.04e-10 ***
#> follow_ups   -3.3093     0.6618  -5.001 0.000243 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 7.923 on 13 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.658,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.6316 
#> F-statistic: 25.01 on 1 and 13 DF,  p-value: 0.0002427
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
model_2 <- lm(satisfaction ~ follow_ups + subscription, data = customer_sat)
summary(model_2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = satisfaction ~ follow_ups + subscription, data = customer_sat)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -4.3222 -2.1972  0.3167  2.2667  3.9944 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                      Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)           26.7667     6.6804   4.007  0.00206 ** 
#> follow_ups             2.1944     0.7795   2.815  0.01682 *  
#> subscriptionPremium   44.7222     5.6213   7.956 6.88e-06 ***
#> subscriptionPremium+  18.0722     2.1659   8.344 4.37e-06 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 2.958 on 11 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.9597,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.9487 
#> F-statistic: 87.21 on 3 and 11 DF,  p-value: 5.956e-08
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
coefficients_comparison <- data.frame(
  Model1 = coef(model_1),
  Model2 = coef(model_2)
)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> Warning in data.frame(Model1 = coef(model_1), Model2 = coef(model_2)): row
#> names were found from a short variable and have been discarded
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(coefficients_comparison)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#>      Model1    Model2
#> 1 78.886047 26.766667
#> 2 -3.309302  2.194444
#> 3 78.886047 44.722222
#> 4 -3.309302 18.072222
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_dag_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(customer_sat, aes(x = follow_ups, y = satisfaction,)) +
  geom_point(shape = 16) +  
  labs(x = "Follow-up Calls", y = "Satisfaction", title = "Scatter Plot: Follow-up Calls vs Satisfaction") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "red") 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::
